pages.text: Witchers will recieve rewards for handing in $(l:contracts/trophies#page_trophies)trophies$() they have collected. Press $(6)$(l)[$(k:saveToolbarActivator)]$() $(l)(Creative: Save Hotbar Activator)$() while holding a trophy and looking at a Villager in close range to recieve a reward.
Any Villager can be a trophy recipient. Trophies will be consumed upon handing them in.

pages.title: Reward Types
pages.text: Turning in a trophy will yield several possible types of loot:$(br)$(li)$(l)XP$(): Experience points will always be granted based on the rarity and difficulty of the target.$(br)$(li)$(l)Trophy Loot$(): Useful loot related to the target will always drop. For example, Creepers will reward a large amount of Gunpowder.

$(li)$(l)Bonus Stashes$(): Each time you turn in a trophy, there is a 30% chance to recieve a bonus chest containing useful loot related to a mob group. They are the only way to obtain $(l:crafting/medallions)Witcher Medallions$(). They include:$(li2)$(l)Overworld$()$(li2)$(l)Nether$()$(li2)$(l)Aquatic$()$(li2)$(l)Dimensional$()$(li2)$(l)Monster$()$(li2)$(l)Illager$()$(li2)$(l)Piglin$()$(li2)$(l)Boss$()

$(li)$(l)Relic Materials$(): Materials used to craft the strongest Witcher weapons, which drop at a low chance from boss trophies:$(li2)$(l:crafting/elder_blood#page_elder_blood)Ender Dragon$()$(li2)$(l:crafting/ladys_favour#page_ladys_favour)Wither$()$(li2)$(l:crafting/tedd_sample#page_tedd_sample)Elder Guardian$()$(li2)$(l:crafting/violet_rose#page_violet_rose)Warden$()
